messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Just to be sure I find the right reminders, could you please tell me what today’s date is (or the exact calendar date you mean by “yesterday”)?
I actually don't know the current date.
I’ll be happy to check, but to make sure I pull the right reminder(s) I need a reference date. Could you look at your phone/tablet/computer and tell me what today’s calendar date is?
Sorry, I can't check the date right now. Maybe you can look it up and find the reminder for me?

messages.name: search_reminder
messages.content: ValueError: No search criteria are given. At least one search criteria should be provided among ('reminder_id', 'content', 'creation_timestamp', 'creation_timestamp', 'reminder_timestamp', 'reminder_timestamp', 'latitude', 'longitude')

I’m sorry—I need at least some reference point (such as today’s calendar date or any other clue about the time frame) to figure out which reminders occurred “yesterday.” If you can give me even an approximate date—or any other detail that might identify the reminder (for example, a keyword it contains)—I’ll be able to pull it up for you.
